### INSTALL ###
IF(CMAKE_HOST_WIN32)
	#IF(NOT EXISTS "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r20b/ndk-build.cmd")
		DKINSTALL(https://dl.google.com/android/repository/android-ndk-r20b-windows-x86_64.zip android-ndk-r20b)
	#ENDIF()
	GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(ANDROID_NDK "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r20b" ABSOLUTE)  #Get the windows short filepath
ENDIF()

IF(CMAKE_HOST_APPLE)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r20b)
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/android-ndk-r20b-darwin-x86_64.zip)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/android-ndk-r20b-darwin-x86_64.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-ndk-r20b-darwin-x86_64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()
	SET(ANDROID_NDK "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r20b")
ENDIF()

IF(CMAKE_HOST_LINUX)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r20b)
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/android-ndk-r20b-linux-x86_64.zip)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/android-ndk-r20b-linux-x86_64.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-ndk-r20b-linux-x86_64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()
	SET(ANDROID_NDK "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r20b")
ENDIF()
